metadata.prompt: Create a Calculator Thing with Add and Multiply services

params.serviceCode:
/**
 * Service: Add
 * Created: 2025-01-08 10:00 by Coding Agent
 * Last Modified: 2025-01-08 10:00 by Coding Agent
 * 
 * Description:
 *   Adds two numbers and returns the result
 * 
 * Inputs:
 *   - a (NUMBER): First number
 *   - b (NUMBER): Second number
 * 
 * Output:
 *   - NUMBER: Sum of a and b
 * 
 * Change Log:
 *   2025-01-08 - Coding Agent - Initial creation
 */
var result = a + b;

/**
 * Service: Multiply
 * Created: 2025-01-08 10:00 by Coding Agent
 * Last Modified: 2025-01-08 10:00 by Coding Agent
 * 
 * Description:
 *   Multiplies two numbers and returns the result
 * 
 * Inputs:
 *   - a (NUMBER): First number
 *   - b (NUMBER): Second number
 * 
 * Output:
 *   - NUMBER: Product of a and b
 * 
 * Change Log:
 *   2025-01-08 - Coding Agent - Initial creation
 */
var result = a * b;
